data.comment: The big names in today's match at Old Trafford have now been confirmed.
The match is underway at Old Trafford.
In the minute 1, Throw-in for Man Utd in the half of Wolverhampton.
Ball safe as Wolverhampton is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Adama Traore for the away team is judged to be offside.
In the minute 3, Corner awarded to Man Utd.
Man Utd drive forward but Marcus Rashford is judged offside.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Manchester.
In the minute 8, Wolverhampton drives forward and Pedro Neto gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Goal kick for Wolverhampton at Old Trafford.
Man Utd are pushing forward but Marcus Rashford's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 11, Throw-in Man Utd.
Vitinha of Wolverhampton smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Wolverhampton's Ruben Neves gets in a shot on goal at Old Trafford. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 13, Wolverhampton's Pedro Neto gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Man Utd defender.
Throw-in high up the field for Wolverhampton in Manchester.
Can Man Utd capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Wolverhampton's half?
In the minute 15, Throw-in for Wolverhampton at Old Trafford.
Free kick Wolverhampton.
Wolverhampton have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 17, Ball goes out of play for a Wolverhampton goal kick.
Jon Moss awards the away team a throw-in.
Man Utd to take a throw-in in Wolverhampton territory.
In the minute 19, Jon Moss signals a free kick to Wolverhampton in their own half.
Free kick for Wolverhampton in the half of Man Utd.
Romain Saiss (Wolverhampton) gets in a header but the ball hits the bar! Ohhhh so close.
In the minute 23, Jon Moss awards Man Utd a goal kick.
Wolverhampton needs to be cautious. Man Utd have an attacking throw-in.
In Manchester, Aaron Wan-Bissaka (Man Utd) misses the target with a header.
In the minute 27, Wolverhampton have a goal kick.
Wolverhampton's Rayan Ait-Nouri gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Man Utd goal kick.
In the minute 32, Wolverhampton awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Pedro Neto has recovered and rejoins the match in Manchester.
Attention is being given to Wolverhampton’s Pedro Neto and play has been suspended briefly.
In the minute 33, Jon Moss awards Wolverhampton a goal kick.
Bruno Fernandes for Man Utd drives towards goal at Old Trafford. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In Manchester Man Utd attack through Edinson Cavani. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 34, Wolverhampton have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Wolverhampton in their own half.
Throw-in for Man Utd close to the penalty box.
In the minute 37, Goal kick for Wolverhampton at Old Trafford.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Wolverhampton close to the penalty box.
In the minute 39, Wolverhampton's Romain Saiss is on target but unsuccessful.
Wolverhampton have been awarded a corner by Jon Moss.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Manchester.
In the minute 40, Jon Moss signals a throw-in for Man Utd, close to Wolverhampton's area.
Wolverhampton awarded a free kick in their own half.
Jon Moss waits before resuming play because Rayan Ait-Nouri for Wolverhampton is still down.
In the minute 43, Wolverhampton’s Rayan Ait-Nouri is on his feet again at Old Trafford.
In Manchester a free kick has been awarded the away team.
1 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, The first-half is over at Old Trafford.
The second-half is now underway.
In the minute 46, Wolverhampton will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Man Utd.
Man Utd make their first substitution with Luke Shaw replacing Alex Telles.
Jon Moss signals a Man Utd throw-in in Wolverhampton's half.
Throw-in for Wolverhampton in their own half.
In the minute 48, Throw-in Wolverhampton.
Can Man Utd get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Wolverhampton's half?
Jon Moss signals a free kick to Wolverhampton.
In the minute 50, Marcus Rashford (Man Utd) has received a yellow card from Jon Moss.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Free kick for Man Utd in their own half.
In the minute 52, Throw-in for Wolverhampton at Old Trafford.
Man Utd awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Man Utd in their own half.
Jon Moss awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 55, The away team have replaced Vitinha with Daniel Podence. This is the first substitution made today by Nuno Espirito Santo.
Ball safe as Man Utd is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 58, Jon Moss signals a free kick to Wolverhampton in their own half.
Free kick Man Utd.
Goal kick for Wolverhampton at Old Trafford.
In the minute 60, Can Wolverhampton get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Man Utd's half?
Ball goes out of play for a Man Utd goal kick.
Throw-in for Wolverhampton in the half of Man Utd.
Man Utd attack but Marcus Rashford's header doesn't find the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Manchester.
In the minute 64, Anthony Martial is replacing Mason Greenwood for Man Utd at Old Trafford.
In the minute 65, Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Rayan Ait-Nouri for Wolverhampton who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Man Utd awarded a free kick in their own half.
Wolverhampton's Rayan Ait-Nouri looks ok and returns to the pitch.
In the minute 67, Man Utd have a dangerous throw-in.
Nuno Espirito Santo is making the team's second substitution at Old Trafford with Fabio Silva replacing Pedro Neto.
Man Utd have been awarded a corner by Jon Moss.
In the minute 70, In Manchester Man Utd's Edinson Cavani is caught offside.
Wolverhampton push forward at Old Trafford and Adama Traore gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Man Utd defence.
Corner awarded to Wolverhampton.
In the minute 72, Romain Saiss of Wolverhampton is pulled up for offside.
Jon Moss awards Wolverhampton a goal kick.
Rui Patricio (Wolverhampton) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 74, Jon Moss signals a Man Utd throw-in in Wolverhampton's half.
In Manchester Man Utd drive forward through Paul Pogba. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In Manchester, Anthony Martial of Man Utd is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 76, Man Utd's Anthony Martial is whistled for offside at Old Trafford.
Man Utd are coming forward and Anthony Martial gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Wolverhampton have a goal kick.
In the minute 79, Marcus Rashford (Man Utd) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In Manchester Man Utd's Marcus Rashford is caught offside.
Wolverhampton awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 80, Ball safe as Man Utd is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Man Utd at Old Trafford.
Wolverhampton to take a throw-in in Man Utd territory.
In the minute 81, Wolverhampton pushes forward through Rayan Ait-Nouri, whose finish on goal is saved.
Free kick for Wolverhampton in the half of Man Utd.
David De Gea is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
In the minute 85, David De Gea returns to the field for Man Utd after picking up a slight injury.
Bruno Fernandes (Man Utd) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In Manchester a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 87, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Man Utd in the half of Wolverhampton.
Free kick for Wolverhampton in their own half.
Throw-in for Man Utd close to the penalty box.
The fourth official's board shows 5 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd half.
Jon Moss signals a free kick to Wolverhampton in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Wolverhampton goal kick.
Jon Moss signals a free kick to Man Utd.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Manchester.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 1-0.
Marcus Rashford scores to make it 1-0 at Old Trafford.
Bruno Fernandes with an assist there.
Ole Gunnar Solskjaer (Man Utd) is making a third substitution, with Scott McTominay replacing Bruno Fernandes.
